info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:31PM EDT until September 08 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Saratoga County in east central New York... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 431 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burnt Hills, or 8 miles north of Scotia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Ballston Spa, Galway, North Ballston Spa, Burnt Hills, Rock City Falls, Kings, Gates, Wilton, Malta, Greenfield, Northumberland, Charlton, Schuylerville, Victory, Deans Corners, Grangerville, Kings Station, West Milton and Garrison Manor. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
